1301290.name: Granny Kick Neighbor
1301290.description:
Granny Kick Neighbor is a stress-fixing game that allows you to unleash your frustration and have a blast in a destruction simulator. As a grandma or grandpa, you have the opportunity to smash houses, offices, supermarkets, and even a pizza restaurant. With its funny gameplay and crazy physics, this game offers a unique and entertaining experience.

In Granny Kick Neighbor, you can choose to play as either a grandma or a grandpa, each with their own objectives. As a grandma, your mission is to run and destroy your neighbor's house, while as a grandpa, you get to wreak havoc in the office. The game provides different types of weapons to aid you in your destruction, making it even more enjoyable.

Fights against zombies or lethal robots in open world maps or break furniture, cars, statues and the dog house? The bots can help you to play in multiplayer mode.

Guns like hammer, baseball bat, gun, pistol, sniper, shotgun, machine gun, rpg, grenade, bow, blade, katana, explosive and more weapons are at your disposal in this shooter game to help you.

One of the highlights of Granny Kick Neighbor is its easy mode, which allows you to relax and have fun without any pressure. Whether you're looking to relieve stress or simply have a good time, this game offers a hilarious and satisfying gameplay experience.

Get ready to enjoy the fun explosion and gun game with Granny Kick Neighbor.

The story of this game of granny against her neighborhood is that one fine day you are tired of your neighbor always making noise at all hours and it is time to take revenge!

Your neighbor is a bit scared and soon he is scared to see you with all that arsenal of weapons and especially if you break the TV or his cell phone, he will cry and run all over the house.

You are an old woman but you have a very strong spirit, you have not yet become a ghost so take your weapon and get peace in the neighbor's house.

Other grannies will help you so you won't be alone fighting against your neighbor, this game is multiplayer and you will see a lot of grannies fighting like you. Your neighbor will go crazy by the way your neighbor's last name is Smith, granny.

Being a granny you have to be careful not to hurt yourself with so many weapons. The zombies, the aliens and the robots are very, very evil and mischievous so you will have to need help from the other players.

When you see a vehicle or a car shoot and destroy it. Shooting is the most fun in the game because the bullets never run out.

The true power of weapons is found in the gunslinger, who is your granny. Never before have you felt the adrenaline so strong in this game of action and destruction. Sometimes you will need to open a jack-in-the-box to get free prizes without cheating. The sky is the limit on the big explosions produced by your cool weapons. The neighbor will always be hiding waiting for you to appear to run away and escape from you, granny.

If you have a low-powered mobile, don't worry because the game of granny against the neighbor is highly optimized and the graphics are very nice for everyone. You just have to enjoy playing and destroy all the neighbor's house to get points to be able to continue the missions. The more shots you make at the objects, the more points they will give you. You can destroy cars, houses, vases, televisions, cell phones, stereos, garden furniture, even the dog's house!

If you're bored, don't worry because it also has a mode in which you fight with the police, the swat team and you're the leader, you rule. You can also go to totally different worlds like a bank, a pirate ship or an alien spaceship. This granny game is very complete and fun.

It is the second improved part of the totally original granny destroys the neighbor's house game with smooth controls so that everyone can play it without complications. Use assault weapons, pistols, grenades, rocket launchers, minigun, bow, arrows, shotgun and more.

You can test the new horror mode in this grandma granny experience.
